function.name: openweathermap
function.description: Complete weather data access via OpenWeatherMap API. Current weather, forecasts (5-day, hourly), air quality, alerts, and geocoding. Free tier: 60 calls/min.

city.description: City name (e.g., 'Paris', 'London,UK', 'New York,US'). For current_weather, forecast_5day, geocoding

lat.description: Latitude (-90 to 90). For operations using coordinates

lon.description: Longitude (-180 to 180). For operations using coordinates

units.description: Temperature units: metric (°C), imperial (°F), standard (K). Default: metric

limit.description: Max results for geocoding operations. Default: 5, max: 10

exclude.description: Parts to exclude from onecall response. Default: none
